src:
Foto Bisnis
Geliat Usaha Ternak Babi, Bisnis Menggiurkan di Perbatasan RI
06 Nov 2019, 04:54 by Pradita Utama
 Nunukan - Bisnis ternak babi jadi salah satu usaha andalan warga di perbatasan Indonesia. Harga jual yang tinggi membuat warga tertarik untuk mengembangkan usaha ini.



Ternak babi jadi salah satu bisnis yang banyak dilakukan oleh warga di Desa Ba Sikor, Kecamatan Krayan, Kabupaten Nunukan, Kalimantan Utara.
 



Kepala Desa Ba Sikor Long Midang Yuekab, jadi salah satu warga yang memilihara babi sebagai hewan ternak.
 



Yuekab pun rutin memeriksa kondisi hewan ternaknya tersebut.
 



Menurut Yuekab, banyak warga di sana yang mengonsumsi daging babi, oleh karena itu, bisnis ternak babi jadi salah satu usaha favorit warga di wilayah perbatasan Indonesia-Malaysia tersebut.
 



Harga babi pun dinilai lebih tinggi jika dibandingkan dengan sapi maupun kerbau.
 



Babi ternak tersebut dibanderol dengan harga mencapai Rp 10 juta per ekornya.
 



Tak heran banyak warga di kawasan tersebut yang memelihara babi sebagai hewan ternak, karena keuntungan yang diperoleh pun cukup menggiurkan.
text:
Business Photos
Wriggling Business of Pigs, A Tantalizing Business in the Indonesian Border
Nov 6, 2019, 04:54 by Pradita Utama
Nunukan - The pig business is one of the mainstay businesses in the Indonesian border. High selling prices make residents interested in developing this business.



Pigs become one of the businesses that are mostly carried out by residents in Ba Sikor Village, Krayan District, Nunukan Regency, North Kalimantan.




Ba Sikor Long Midang Yuekab Village Chief, became one of the residents who chose pigs as livestock.




Yuekab also routinely checks the condition of the livestock.




According to Yuekab, many residents there consume pork, therefore, the pig business is one of the people's favorite businesses in the Indonesia-Malaysia border region.




The price of pigs is also considered higher when compared to cows and buffalo.




The pigs are priced at Rp 10 million per animal.




No wonder many residents in the area keep pigs as livestock, because the benefits obtained are quite tempting.
